Index.title: Hello world!
Index.description: This is a multi-language site for a Onesight challenge.

trybe.responsibilities: As part of the teams responsible for course and assessment content, I worked on making improvements, implementing new features, testing, bug fixing, and refactoring. Additionally, as a former student of Trybe, I had the opportunity to contribute to enhancing the student experience, bringing both a user perspective and a developer's viewpoint.
trybe.skills: React, Typescript, GraphQL, React Testing Library, Redux, Mantine, Github, HTML, CSS

jungleDevs.projectDescription: Canal Digital is a real estate rental platform whose purpose is to reduce bureaucracy renting a property. It consists of two sites, one for the future client and the other for real estate agencies.
jungleDevs.responsibilities: While working on Canal Digital I helped in the maintenance, improvement and to add features to the application. This is a production project following an Agile flow where we work on sprints of two weeks. The team is quite dynamic and we focus on client feedback to keep improving the features usability and performance. Lastly, this portal has many integrations with different legacy systems from the multiple agencies and it is always fundamental to make sure everyone is aligned and following good communication processes to prevent bugs from reaching production.
jungleDevs.skills: React Native, Redux, ReactJS, AMP, Scrum, Kanban, Typescript, Javascript, ContextAPI

alliance.responsibilities: Construction supervision; verification of services; project analysis; surveying and budgeting; approving and monitoring purchase requests and orders; employee training; construction planning; labor analysis; application and monitoring of construction quality; post-delivery customer service.

trybe.description: 1500 hour course, which encompasses the following stacks: Git, GitHub, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, RTL, SQL and NoSQL database, MVC, API, REST, Algorithms, Data structure, Python

ipog.fieldOfStudy: Construction Management, Construction Technology and Quality
